node.title: Why I decided to start coding

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Why I dediced to start coding...

I had the job I wanted. I had to convince some folks I was the best person to be the new Product Manager at my company. But 9 months in, something just felt broken for me.

I realized I wasn't going in the direction I wanted to go.

So, I decided I'd quit my job and learn how to code by myself.

But why exactly did I do this?
Your very first content with Contentful, pulled in JSON format using the Content Delivery API.
Webhooks notify you, another person or system when resources have changed by calling a given HTTP endpoint.
